dmca.title: [EV1-C1714737D] Request for Removal of Copyrighted Material
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Tuesday, November 07, 2006 8:26 AM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1714737D] Request for Removal of Copyrighted Material Subject: [EV1-C1714737D] Request for Removal of Copyrighted Material MICHAEL CROOK INTERNET PROPERTIES 8417 Oswego Road, #179 Baldwinsville, NY 13027 HYPERLINK "http://www.mcipdns.com" www.mcipdns.com (315) 560-8886 November 7, 2006 To Whom it May Concern: Pursuant to Title II of the Digital Mill ennium Copyright Act ("DMCA"), namely, t he Online Copyright Infringement Liabil ity Act, you are hereby notified that ce rtain copyright infringing materials are currently hosted by you in your capacit y as an online service provider ("OSP"). This letter serves as written notificat ion of claimed infringement. As required by 512(c)(3)(A)(i-vi) of the DMCA, the fol lowing information is provided concernin g the claimed infringement: (i) A physical or electronic signature o f a person authorized to act on behalf o f the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed. This signature appears below. (ii) Identification of the copyrighted w ork claimed to have been infringed, or, if multiple copyrighted works at a singl e online site are covered by a single no tification, a representative list of suc h works at that site. (iii) Identification of the material tha t is claimed to be infringing or to be t he subject of infringing activity and th at is to be removed or access to which i s to be disabled, and information reason ably sufficient to permit the service p rovider to locate the material. HYPERLINK "http://www.guzer.com/videos/ idiot_michael_crook.php" http://www.guzer.com/videos/idiot_michae l_crook.php Consent for use of my image did not exte nd outside of the Fox family of channels. To the best of my knowledge, information, and belief, Fox News Channe l did not expressly consent to the uploading o f these videos. Hence, it is my contention that my right s under the DMCA are being violated by t continued presence of these videos, as I obviously hold a copyright to my image when the assumption was that the interview would be confined exclusively to one medium. Furthermore, the act displaying this vid eo shows malicious intent, and is not co vered under Fair Use , as my image is the underlying precept, and I do not grant consent for this malicious, hateful, and volatile ac tivity. (v) A statement that the complaining par ty has a good faith belief that use of t he material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright owner , its agent, or the law. I have a good faith belief that use of t he copyrighted materials described above allegedly infringing is not authorized b y the copyright owner, its agent, or the law, in that I reasonably believe that Fox Ne ws Channel did not specifically authoriz this, and if their authority to do so, I submit, does not extend beyond the Fox family of channels, as that is not in harmony w ith my consent to them. (vi) A statement that the information in the notification is accurate, and under penalty of perjury, that the complainin g party is authorized to act on behalf o f the owner of an exclusive right that i s allegedly infringed. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate, in that I believe I am a legit imate copyright owner by reason of being person within the video, or am authorize d to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infrin ged, the exclusive right being my likene ss and image being used solely on Fox News Chan nel, and that right is not transferable FNC. My likeness and image is the factu al and legal equivalent of a trademark. The DMCA further provides that the OSP s hall fall within the safe harbor provisi ons of the Online Copyright Infringemen t Liability Act only if it complies with this notification procedure. Specifical ly, the Act states that upon obtaining k nowledge or awareness of the copyright i nfringement, the OSP must act expeditiou sly to remove, or disable access to, the material. See 512(c)(1)(A)(2), (c)(1)(C). Having now received such knowledge or aw areness by way of this notice, such exp editious action is hereby requested. Yo uTube has reactivated this video, and is thereby subjecting themselves to potent ially serious legal action, which I WILL take if said video is not immediately r emoved. I may be reached regarding this matter a t dmca@mcipdns.com. Sincerely, Michael Crook yqmfb^bVI IDATx^ ~gsfP0 urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smartta PersonName urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smartta address urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smartta Street urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smartta urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smartta urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smartta urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smartta PostalCode Michael and Beth Crook Normal Microsoft Office Word _PID_HLINKS Microsoft Office Word Document MSWordDoc Word.Document.8 _PID_HLINKS ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1.
